title: Beef tagine with plantains
ingredients: ['zest of 2 oranges', '15g caster sugar', 'oil for frying', '4 very ripe plantains, peeled and sliced', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '200g beef shoulder roast, cut into 1cm cubes', '1 onion, chopped', '2 tomatoes, chopped', '1 teaspoon cumin seed', '2 carrots, peeled and sliced', '100g green beans', '1 sweet pepper, chopped', '4 garlic cloves', '1 bouquet garni (thyme, bay leaf)', '250ml water', '50g raisins', '1 vegetable stock cube', 'a few white peppercorns, crushed', '1 pinch salt and pepper']
